title: Champion Select - Lock problem
body:
Sometimes in champion select you cant lock champion , it doesn't matter in normal games,  but in ranked games when it costs you one promo it maters! 
Will they solve this problem?
Thanks.
{{sticker:sg-shisa}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Yeah that has to be irritating.  :(  This can happen if your connection is unstable and losing sync with champion select.  I recommend sticking to customs to troubleshoot for now, and run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up!
